players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is dead. I investigated Diana last night and found out she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out."
Diana: "Charlie is probably the mafioso himself! He's trying to frame me after killing Bob. We should vote him out instead."
You: "I think Charlie might be right about Diana being the mafioso. Let's discuss voting her out."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. Bob's death is on her hands. We must vote her out to survive."
Diana: "Charlie, you're obviously lying to deflect suspicion! If you're the detective, prove it with more details. I think you're the real mafioso—vote him out!"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
